directions: Place sauerkraut, water, carrot, brown sugar, apple, sweet onion, caraway seeds, salt, and black pepper in a slow cooker. Cook on Low for about 7 hours; add kielbasa. Cook for one more hour.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pound fully cooked kielbasa, cut into 1-inch pieces (optional)
title: Sandy's Sweet Slow Cooker Sauerkraut
